concept/intro.title: What Is Web App Pentesting?
concept/intro.description: Welcome to the Concept quadrant! Here you’ll learn the “what” and “why” of web app penetration testing.

how-to/intro.title: Reconnaissance How‑To
how-to/intro.description: This How‑To quadrant will walk you step‑by‑step through tasks like subdomain enumeration and directory brute‑forcing.

reference/intro.title: Pentest Cheat‑Sheets & Payloads
reference/intro.description: The Reference quadrant collects payloads, commands, and quick‑lookup tables for your pentests.

tutorial/intro.title: Full Pentest Lab Tutorial
tutorial/intro.description: In this Tutorial quadrant, we’ll build a complete vulnerable web‑app lab from scratch and exploit it end‑to‑end.
